# ToDo List App - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a React-based ToDo list application with a black and white theme, built using Vite.

## Tech Stack
- React 18
- Vite 5
- CSS3 (Custom styling, no CSS framework)

## Project Structure
- `/src/App.jsx` - Main application component with all ToDo logic
- `/src/index.css` - Global styles with black & white theme
- `/src/main.jsx` - React entry point

## Coding Conventions
- Use functional components with React hooks
- Use CSS custom properties for theming
- Follow the black and white color scheme
- Keep components simple and focused

## Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run preview` - Preview production build
